General.Name: Jiangsu LiXing General Steel Ball Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu LiXing General Steel Ball Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of mechanical parts and auto components in China. The company offers precision bearing steel balls, noiseless steel balls, special automobile steel balls, special hub steel balls, and windmill steel balls. Its products are primarily used for motor vehicle manufacturing, precision machine tools, light industrial appliances, wind power generation, engineering machinery, aviation equipment, and other general mechanical equipment manufacturing application, as well as high load capacity requirements, such as rail transit, shield machines, wind power spindles, and heavy trucks. Jiangsu LiXing General Steel Ball Co.,Ltd. is headquartered in Rugao, China.

6.Name: Mr. Bang You  Zhang
6.Title: Sec. to the Board & Assistant to GM
